title: Fifty Shades of Grey : U.S. sales figures in 2012 , by platform
summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Copy Type, and Number of copies in millions in each Copy Type on the y axis.
The maximum Number of copies in millions 29.0 is found at Copy Type Print and the minimum is found at Digital where Copy Type is 15.0.
The Number of copies in millions of Copy Type Print is 1.93% larger than the minimum value at Digital.
min_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Copy Type, and Number of copies in millions in each Copy Type on the y axis.
The maximum Number of copies in millions 29.0 is found at Copy Type Print and the minimum is found at Digital where Copy Type is 15.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Copy Type, and Number of copies in millions in each Copy Type on the y axis.
The maximum Number of copies in millions 29.0 is found at Copy Type Print and the minimum is found at Digital where Copy Type is 15.0.
The Number of copies in millions of Copy Type Print is 1.93% larger than the minimum value at Digital.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Copy Type in the x axis and Number of copies in millions in the y axis.
Copy Type Print has the highest Number of copies in millions and Digital has the lowest Number of copies in millions.
The minimum Copy Type Digital has got 1.93 times less Number of copies in millions than the maximum Copy Type Print.
The lowest value 15.0 at Digital is almost 1.32 times smaller than the average value 22.0.
The Number of copies in millions is 44.0 if we add up values of all Copy Types.
